notes: An early version of The Hand of Fear was originally scheduled to be produced as the final serial of season 13 but was replaced by The Seeds of Doom.
This story marked the director Douglas Camfield's last involvement with Doctor Who.
The Krynoid costume was repurposed from an Axon costume from The Claws of Axos and sprayed green.
This serial was the last to use the Brachacki police box prop before it wore out.
The production used outside broadcasting for exteriors, previously used in Robot and The Sontaran Experiment.
Kenneth Gilbert almost did not appear due to contracting chickenpox, but the shooting schedule was adjusted to accommodate his recovery.
The Doctor previously visited Antarctica in The Tenth Planet.

continuity_notes: The Doctor and UNIT do not meet again until Battlefield.
The Krynoids appear in other Doctor Who media such as Stop the Pigeon, Hothouse, The Root of All Evil, and The Green Man.
Sarah Jane Smith returns to Antarctica in Snow Blind and The Gift.

plot.plot_summary: In Antarctica, scientists discover a mysterious pod. The Doctor and Sarah Jane join the investigation, realizing it's extraterrestrial and dangerous. Harrison Chase, an obsessed millionaire, desires the pod. A team is sent by Chase to steal the pod, leading to a confrontation with a transformed Krynoid creature. As the Krynoid threatens to destroy life, the Doctor and Sarah battle to stop it, involving UNIT and using explosive devices to defeat the threat, ultimately destroying the Krynoid.
